caption.p: In vitro characterization of PLX‐PAD cells. (A) Migration of myoblasts (C2C12) incubated with conditioned medium of PLX‐PAD cells. CM#1, CM#2 and CM#3 are conditioned media from three batches of PLX‐PAD. (B) Secretion of Follistatin, IGFBP‐3, Galectin‐1 and Osteopontin by PLX‐PAD in culture.
